property.name: mapreduce.fileoutputcommitter.task.cleanup.enabled
property.description: Whether tasks should delete their task temporary directories. This is purely an optimization for filesystems without O(1) recursive delete, as commitJob will recursively delete the entire job temporary directory. HDFS has O(1) recursive delete, so this parameter is left false by default. Users of object stores, for example, may want to set this to true. Note: this is only used if mapreduce.fileoutputcommitter.algorithm.version=2 See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MAPREDUCE-7029 for details.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.recovery.store.fs.uri
property.description: URI where history server state is stored.

property.name: mapreduce.job.working.dir
property.description: The FileSystem working directory to use for relative paths.

property.name: mapred.local.dir
property.description: Directories on the local machine in which to store mapreduce temp files.

property.name: mapreduce.fileoutputcommitter.failures.attempts
property.description: Number of attempts when failure happens in commit job.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.recovery.enable
property.description: Enable history server to recover server state on startup.

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum
property.description: Property from MapReduce version 1 still used for TeraGen sharding.

property.name: mapreduce.input.fileinputformat.list-status.num-threads
property.description: The number of threads to use to list and fetch block locations for the specified input paths. Note: multiple threads should not be used if a custom non thread-safe path filter is used. Setting a larger value than the default of 1 can significantly improve job startup overhead, especially if using GCS as input with multi-level directories, such as in partitioned Hive tables.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server Web UI host:port

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.always-scan-user-dir
property.description: Enable history server to always scan user dir.

property.name: mapreduce.fileoutputcommitter.algorithm.version
property.description: Updated file output committer algorithm in Hadoop 2.7+. Significantly improves commitJob times when using the Google Cloud Storage connector. See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MAPREDUCE-4815 for more details.

property.name: mapred.bq.project.id
property.description: Google Cloud Project ID to use for BigQuery operations.

property.name: mapred.bq.output.buffer.size
property.description: The size in bytes of the output buffer to use when writing to BigQuery.

property.name: mapred.bq.gcs.bucket
property.description: The GCS bucket holding temporary BigQuery data for the input connector.
